text: John Forrest "Fuzzy" Knight (May 9, 1901 – February 23, 1976) was an American actor. He appeared mostly in westerns, usually as the hero's friend. He also appeared in the 1950s television series, Captain Gallant of the Foreign Legion. He married actress Patricia Ryan (née Thelma de Long). Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1901 births Category:1976 deaths
title: Fuzzy Knight
